BonusDescriptions: WeaponAttachmentTargets: Standard LRMs and Standard SRMs and Standard MMLs
WeaponAttachmentArtemisDescription: Artemis IV & V missiles both SRM and LRM

Description.Name: Artemis V FCS Attachment
Description.Details: Developed in early 3061 by Clan Goliath Scorpion and quickly distributed through out the entire universe by Clan Diamond Shark and quickly sold throughout the universe, the Artemis V guidance system works with both Artemis IV and Artemis V muntions, allowing for some flexiblity in deployment. Artemis V rounds are very similar to the Artemis IV except they are even more precise in where they strike and just slightly more accurate against moving targets. Cannot be used with other Missile TTS and enables using Artemis IV & Artemis V Ammo.
